windupbox.boxcreator.provided package

Submodules

windupbox.boxcreator.provided.windows module

class windupbox.boxcreator.provided.windows.WindowsBoxCreator(boxdirectory: Path, os_info: WindowsInfo)

Bases: BoxCreator

base boxcreator class for windows boxes, that can be extended to create boxcreator classes for specific windows version, edition, … the class therefore provides basic methods needed for nearly all windows boxes

add_chocolatey_provisioner(packages: Optional[list] = None)
add_powershell_provisioners(provisioners: list)
add_provisioner_setup_ssh()
os_info: WindowsInfo
product_key: str = None
set_product_key(product_key: str)

set product key applied during installation for the specific Windows version

windupbox.boxcreator.provided.windows10 module

class windupbox.boxcreator.provided.windows10.Win10BoxCreator(boxdirectory: Path, windows_info: WindowsInfo)

Bases: WindowsBoxCreator

add_chocolatey_provisioner(packages: Optional[list] = None)
add_powershell_provisioners(provisioners: list[pathlib.Path])
add_provisioner_setup_ssh()
create_box(exclude_download: bool = False)

create a box based on the provided attributes. this includes downloading the image, creating the Packerfile, running the Packerfile as well as cleaning up the temporary needed files.

os_info: WindowsInfo
os_info_filter: WindowsInfoFilter = WindowsInfoFilter(windows_version=['Windows 10'], version=None, edition=None, language=None, architecture=None)
